name: Swarm Rockets
description:
Use WASD to move you fighter, press SPACE to fire rockets. Just mess around and destroy the drones.

https://github.com/HeathManning/Swarm-Rockets

Originally I wanted to make the rockets "flock" together but I forgot about that half-way through getting an initial prototype.

You can play the game through github pages here: https://heathmanning.github.io/Swarm-Rockets/
